name: Adventure Story (Rafael Londres)
description:
WASD = Move
Left Shift = Dash
Space bar = Jump
Left Mouse Button = Attack

This is my first Unity project from my program at Conestoga College!  It was finished in December last year, but I was only able to properly publish it here now. Has it's share of problems however I'm proud of it for my first project.

Small project created as my final game engine course in my Game Design college program.

Credits:

Most art assets in this project were NOT developed by me. A huge thanks to the folks who shared their work under the public domain licensing:

— Main Character Sprites: Female Warrior set Developed by Clembod. The asset was found on Itch.Io and it’s free for personal AND commercial use (CC-0). Clembod Contact Information: Twitter: @Clembod Instagram: @Clembod email: Clembod@gmail.com Itch.io: https://clembod.itch.io Artstation: https://www.artstation.com/clembod 

— Enemies, Coins, and Power Up sprites: Dungeon Tileset II Developed by GrafxKid. Also found on Itch.Io under the CC-0 license. https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

— All of the Environment Art: Super Seasonal Platformer tiles Another asset developed by GrafxKid. Found in OpenGameArt.org under the CC-0 license as well. https://opengameart.org/content/super-seasonal-platformer-tiles 

— Musical Scores:

 - “Moms Workout CD” by Zane Little Music, title theme https://opengameart.org/content/moms-workout-cd 

- “Starter [8 bit Dub]” by TAD, level 1 theme https://opengameart.org/content/starter-8-bit-dub - “Bit Forest Intro” by bertsz, level 2 theme https://opengameart.org/content/bit-forest-intro

- “8 bit lofi - Ice Cave” by TAD, level 3 theme https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-lofi-ice-cave 

- “Since 2 am” by TAD, game over theme https://opengameart.org/content/since-2-am Everything else (regarding art) was developed by myself, from simple and small sprites to sound effects.
